Preprocessing¶

class preprocessing.preprocessing.Preprocessing(options=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Preprocessing is a very simple class that currently performs minimal preprocessing before attempting to use the vision frames to locate objects on the pitch.

Currently performs normalisation of colours and background subtraction based upon the settings in the main GUI.

get_options()[source]¶
normalize(frame)[source]¶

Normalises the given frame purely on it’s saturation value.

Parameters:frame – The image frame to normalise
Returns:A new frame, with the saturation values normalised and converted back to BGR indexing.
run(frame, options)[source]¶

Accepts a given frame and options and runs the preprocessing steps specified by options.

Parameters:
  • frame – The image to preprocess
  • options – A dictionary containing True/False values for each preprocessing task.
